name: Blood and Lust and Lust for Blood
name_original: Blood and Lust and Lust for Blood
description:
!!!CONTENT WARNING!!! this game contains

 

Blood/Gore.

 

Violence.

 

Kidnapping.

 

Implied Child Neglect.

 

Death/Murder.

 

 

 

After returning to the house, he spent a summer in as a child, Dimitri discovers that what he had thought were simply childish delusions might have been realer than he imagined.
